desc:
Post 1630
-  Become a Jehovah's Witness.
- As a Jehovah's Witness, you have the power of god on your side. On your turn, you may cast Divine Intervention for 4 Spell Slots. Give your request to the host and roll a d100. if it's equal or lower than the amount of cards you have, god intervenes, and the host provides what happens.
- When you make someone draw a card, spend 2 spell slots to Smite them as well, doing 1d6 Radiant damage if they do not have a <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, or <:impact:1106704414225485894> card. does max damage if they have multiple <:black:1106265022453268530> or <:red:1106234051129507932> cards. The player draws cards equal to Radiant damage dealt.
- Provides Immunity to Radiant damage.
